last_episode_to_air.name: What Rough Beast
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rowan inadvertently discovers her role in a prophecy that's held the Mayfair family for generations. Sip's investigation reaches its conclusion, uncovering secrets that could tarnish both Rowan's family and his role in the Talamasca.

name: Mayfair Witches
overview: An intuitive young neurosurgeon discovers that she is the unlikely heir to a family of witches. As she grapples with her newfound powers, she must contend with a sinister presence that has haunted her family for generations.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Neurosurgeon Rowan Fielding has a problem - when she gets mad, she kills with her mind. Her search for answers sends her toward her secretive biological family. In New Orleans, Deirdre Mayfair is desperate to escape from her aunt's oppressive house.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two continues the journey of Rowan Mayfair after she has unwittingly given birth to the demon Lasher. She is determined to understand what he has become – human or monster? – and to use him to fulfill her purpose as a healer, but when tragedy strikes, she must put aside her own desires and fight to protect her family.

episodes.name: The Witching Hour
episodes.overview: Neurosurgeon Rowan Fielding has a problem - when she gets mad, she kills with her mind. Her search for answers sends her toward her secretive biological family. In New Orleans, Deirdre Mayfair is desperate to escape from her aunt's oppressive house.

episodes.name: The Dark Place
episodes.overview: Wracked with grief over Ellie's death, Rowan is out of control, unfit to perform surgeries. Her paranoia that someone is following her is proven true. In NOLA, Deirdre and her mysterious companion Lasher work together to draw Rowan home.

episodes.name: Second Line
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Deirdre's grisly death, Rowan searches for safety in a strange city. Sip provides her with a safehouse while he investigates Deirdre's murder. Lasher makes contact with Rowan - but not in the way you might expect.

episodes.name: Curiouser and Curiouser
episodes.overview: At Deirdre's funeral, Rowan is plunged into the world of the infamous Mayfair family. Uncle Cortland and Aunt Carlotta present diverging views on Lasher. Rowan must choose who to trust and face the dire consequences. Sip identifies Deirdre's killer.

episodes.name: The Thrall
episodes.overview: Trapped in the First Street House, Rowan and Sip must confront its many mysteries in order to escape. Rowan grapples with an inconceivable offer. Sip's sister Odette makes a horrifying discovery.

episodes.name: Transference
episodes.overview: Desperate to relinquish Lasher, Rowan reaches out to her extended Mayfair family for help. She must trust their unique process, a sacred ritual. Sip's search for answers takes him back to the Talamasca.

episodes.name: Tessa
episodes.overview: Rowan makes a shocking discovery, but has to deal with it alone. A tragic event brings her closer to the Mayfairs - and Lasher. Sip falls deeper down the rabbit hole of the key necklace.

episodes.name: What Rough Beast
episodes.overview: Rowan inadvertently discovers her role in a prophecy that's held the Mayfair family for generations. Sip's investigation reaches its conclusion, uncovering secrets that could tarnish both Rowan's family and his role in the Talamasca.
